front.title: Prefix Pool Option for DHCPv6 Relay Agent

abstract.t: The Prefix Pool option provides an automatic mechanism for the information exchange between DHCPv6 server and DHCPv6 Relay Agent. The information about Prefix Pools maintained on DHCPv6 server can be transferred from server to relay agent through this DHCPv6 option to support the necessary route aggregation on the provide edge router, which has a huge number of routes pointing to the customer networks before the aggregation.
